content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://raw@sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE     = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE raw_data.sap_cawn (
	[MANDT] varchar(8000),
	[ATINN] varchar(8000),
	[ATZHL] varchar(8000),
	[ADZHL] varchar(8000),
	[ATWRT] varchar(8000),
	[ATFLV] float,
	[ATFLB] float,
	[ATCOD] varchar(8000),
	[ATSTD] varchar(8000),
	[ATAWE] varchar(8000),
	[ATAW1] varchar(8000),
	[ATIDN] varchar(8000),
	[SPRAS] varchar(8000),
	[TXTNR] varchar(8000),
	[DATUV] varchar(8000),
	[TECHV] varchar(8000),
	[AENNR] varchar(8000),
	[LKENZ] varchar(8000),
	[DOKAR] varchar(8000),
	[DOKNR] varchar(8000),
	[DOKVR] varchar(8000),
	[DOKTL] varchar(8000),
	[ATZHH] varchar(8000),
	[KNOBJ] varchar(8000),
	[ATWHI] varchar(8000),
	[ATTLV] float,
	[ATTLB] float,
	[ATPRZ] varchar(8000),
	[ATINC] float,
	[ATVPL] varchar(8000),
	[DATA_HORA_EXPORTACAO] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/transacional/saptable/mm/cawn/2021/02/18/cawn_202102181452.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat],
	REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
	REJECT_VALUE = 0
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM raw_data.sap_cawn
GO
